items.question: What is LokaLingo?
items.answer: LokaLingo is an EdTech platform that empowers language educators with AI-powered tools and gives learners a curriculum built from their real conversations. Our core product, The Living Textbook, turns every correction into a personalized learning opportunity.

items.question: How is this different from iTalki, Preply, or Duolingo?
items.answer: Unlike marketplaces that take commissions (up to 60%), Loka charges a flat $6/seat with no revenue sharing. Unlike generic apps, Loka builds a unique curriculum from each learner’s actual conversations — every correction becomes a lesson.

items.question: What does $6/seat include?
items.answer: Everything: Canvas system, AI-powered assessments, student management, booking system, progress tracking, CEFR levels, and multi-language support (EN/JP/KO). No tiers, no upsells.

items.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
items.answer: Not at all. The platform is designed for educators, not developers. If you can use a web browser, you can use Loka.

items.question: Can I use my own AI tools?
items.answer: Yes! Our BYOK (Bring Your Own Key) feature lets you connect your own OpenAI or Anthropic API keys to extend the platform with custom AI features.

items.question: Do I own my student data?
items.answer: Absolutely. Your data is yours. We never sell, share, or use your student data for training AI models. You can export everything at any time.

items.question: What languages does the platform support?
items.answer: The platform interface is available in English, Japanese, and Korean. You can teach any language — the Canvas and AI tools are language-agnostic.

sections.title: The Question That Started Everything
sections.content: No two brains are alike — so why can’t learning be more adaptive? This question drove 23 years of language teaching, thousands of lessons, and countless iterations. The answer became LokaLingo.

sections.title: What’s in a Name?
sections.content: Loka comes from Sanskrit लोक (loka), meaning ‘world’ or ‘place.’ Combined with lingua (Latin for ‘language’), LokaLingo means ‘a world of language’ — a place where every learner’s world shapes their curriculum.

sections.title: CIP: Corrections Inspiring Progress
sections.content: The heart of LokaLingo is CIP — Corrections Inspiring Progress. When a learner makes an error in conversation, the teacher captures it on the Canvas. AI then transforms that correction into personalized review material, quizzes, and spaced repetition. Every mistake becomes a stepping stone.

sections.title: The Three Pillars
sections.content:
Everything we build rests on three pillars:

**Nurture** — A co-active learning environment where mistakes are celebrated, not feared.

**Guide** — CEFR-aligned adaptive assessment that gives learners and educators a clear path forward.

**Accelerate** — AI-powered tools that make practice efficient, targeted, and engaging.

sections.title: Built by Educators, for Educators
sections.content: LokaLingo wasn’t born in a tech incubator. It was born in a classroom. After 23 years running Accent Language School in Japan and delivering over 17,000 lessons, we built the tool we wished existed. The Living Textbook is that tool.

sections.title: The Vision
sections.content: LokaLingo is just the beginning. We’re building toward a platform where every type of learning — languages, leadership, professional skills — benefits from the CIP philosophy. Today it’s The Living Textbook. Tomorrow it’s an ecosystem.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
This privacy policy describes how LokaLingo (株式会社) collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

## Information We Collect

We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and payment information when you create an account or subscribe to our services.

## How We Use Your Information

We use your information to provide and improve our services, process payments, send communications, and ensure platform security.

## Data Protection

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. Your data is stored securely and is never sold to third parties.

## Your Rights

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. Contact us at ryan@lokalingo.com for any data requests.

## Contact

For privacy-related inquiries: ryan@lokalingo.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content:
These terms govern your use of the LokaLingo platform and services.

## Acceptance of Terms

By using LokaLingo, you agree to these terms of service.

## Services

LokaLingo provides an EdTech platform for language educators and learners, including The Living Textbook, AI-powered assessments, and student management tools.

## Pricing

Our current pricing is $6 per active seat per month. Pricing may change with 30 days notice.

## Your Content

You retain ownership of all content you create on the platform. We do not use your content to train AI models.

## Termination

You may cancel your subscription at any time. We may terminate accounts that violate these terms.

## Contact

For questions about these terms: ryan@lokalingo.com

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content:
This policy explains how LokaLingo uses cookies and similar technologies.

## What Are Cookies

Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us provide and improve our services.

## Cookies We Use

**Essential cookies** are required for the platform to function (authentication, language preference, theme preference).

**Analytics cookies** help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

## Managing Cookies

You can control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling essential cookies may affect platform functionality.

## Contact

For questions about our cookie policy: ryan@lokalingo.com
